name: Lotion Crafter - Ceramide Complex
description: Lotion Crafter offers a comprehensive Ceramide Complex featuring a multi-lamellar system combining ceramides, cholesterol, and fatty acids. This complete barrier repair system restores skin barrier function and improves moisture retention through biomimetic lipid ratios that mimic natural skin structure. Ideal for barrier repair formulations and moisturizers.
notes: Complete multi-lamellar system simplifies formulation by providing ceramides, cholesterol, and fatty acids in one ingredient. Ideal for small to medium-scale formulators. Lotion Crafter specializes in accessible quantities for R&D and small batch production.
